title: Project: Multi-Exchange Arbitrage Scanner
content:
## Price Discrepancies

Bitcoin price on Exchange A != Exchange B. A scanner finds these opportunities in real-time.

### Architecture

1.  **Connectors**: Async websocket connections to 5+ exchanges.
2.  **Normalizer**: Standardize symbol names (BTC-USD vs XBT/USD).
3.  **Aggregator**: Maintain a "Global Best Bid/Offer" (GBBO).
4.  **Alerter**: If (Best Bid @ Ex A) > (Best Ask @ Ex B) + Fees -> Alert.

### Challenges

Transferring fiat/crypto between exchanges takes time (block confirmations). True arb usually requires holding inventory on both.
